about.title: About EduLite
about.subtitle: A student-first learning platform, built for areas with weak internet and real challenges.
about.storySubtitle: How a global crisis sparked an educational revolution
about.storyCardSubtitle: From frustration to inspiration, from crisis to solution

pandemic.title: The Challenge
pandemic.description: When the pandemic closed schools worldwide, millions of students were left without access to quality education. Traditional learning methods suddenly seemed inadequate for our interconnected world.

gaza.title: The Moment
gaza.description: The situation in Gaza opened our eyes to how education becomes even more critical during times of crisis. We realized that learning shouldn't be a privilege—it should be a right, accessible to everyone, everywhere.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: EduLite was born from this vision—a platform that makes quality education accessible, engaging, and effective. We believe that every learner deserves the tools to unlock their potential, regardless of their circumstances.

about.educationQuote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
about.readyToJoinDescription: Experience education designed for the modern world. Simple, powerful, and accessible to all.
about.experienceEducation: Experience education designed for the modern world. Simple, powerful, and accessible to all.

pandemic.title: The Personal Struggle
pandemic.description: Picture this: A young student struggling with Microsoft Teams during the pandemic. Slow loading, confusing interface, constant crashes. That frustration sparked a thought: 'Why is education technology so... broken?'

gaza.title: The Breaking Point
gaza.description: Then came 2023. War erupted in Gaza. Over a million students cut off from education for more than a year. Watching this unfold, one question burned brighter than ever:

about.visionQuote: Why aren't we building something made for students?

solution.title: The EduLite Solution
solution.description: That's when everything clicked. EduLite wasn't just born from an idea — it was forged from real pain, real struggles, and a burning desire to build something that actually works for students who need it most.

globalImpact.title: Global Community
globalImpact.description: Built by passionate volunteers from Palestine, Canada, Sudan, Nigeria and developers worldwide who believe education should be accessible to everyone.

about.missionSubtitle: Two fundamental goals that drive everything we do

community.title: Build Community
community.description: Creating spaces where learners connect, collaborate, and grow together. Education thrives in community, and we're building bridges between minds across the globe.

access.title: Enable Access
access.description: Breaking down barriers to quality education. Whether you're in a bustling city or a remote village, technology should empower learning, not limit it.

about.bridgeQuote: We believe education should be a bridge, not a barrier.
about.bridgeDescription: Every feature we build, every design decision we make, every line of code we write serves these two missions. Because when education is accessible and community-driven, extraordinary things happen.

about.communityDescription: EduLite is a 100% volunteer-driven open source project. There is no funding or salaries involved. Everyone contributes out of passion for learning and helping others.

about.finalQuote: EduLite is for every student who just wants to learn — no matter where they are.
